properties.title: Monte-Rosa-Hütte SAC
properties.abstract: Attention ! Le chemin de la cabane passe sur un glacier: Depuis Rotenboden,le glacier du Gorner doit être traversé. L'équipement approprié et une bonne condition sont nécessaires !
properties.description: The high-tech building with its innovative shape and silvery aluminium shell resembles a rock crystal. Building services and energy supply are controlled by software developed at ETH Zurich. Ascents include some of the highest summits in Switzerland. The cabin is among the most visited SAC mountain guesthouses. For the ascent across Gornergletscher hiring a mountain guide is highly recommended for inexperienced mountain hikers.
